name: Extinction Island (DEMO)
description:
On a mysterious island, full of ancient monsters an immense power was discovered. A shady company attempts to harness this power but it is too much for them and the machine created to contain it will explode in 10 hours. Your team has been sent to the island to deactivate the machine before it blows! Run and gun your way through ancient monsters and traps. Survive the island, reach the machine, save the world! This is a run and gun platformer that will test your skills through a level with side scroll shooting and parkour. Extinction Island is not story driven, with more of a focus on game-play and action. Currently this game is played with a keyboard and mouse with controller support to come in future releases. There is a speed run tournament being run all the way up to the full game's release. Top 10 runners will get their names on this board for all the world to see. Post your final time to the discord group to qualify!
